Title: toIntervalMillisecond
Description: Returns an interval of n milliseconds of data type IntervalMillisecond.
n — Number of milliseconds. Integer numbers or string representations thereof, and float numbers. (U)Int*/Float*/String.
Examples: WITH    toDateTime('2024-06-15') AS date,    toIntervalMillisecond(30) AS interval_to_millisecondsSELECT date + interval_to_milliseconds AS result
